meta.name: description
meta.content: Specifies the protocols to initiate a CONNECT tunnel with

main.p: Used by user agents to specify response media types that are acceptable. The list of valid values are described in the TLS Application-Layer Protocol Negotiation (ALPN) Protocol IDs IANA registry.
ALPN is short for Application-Layer Protocol Negotiation (ALPN) Extension and is described in RFC 7301.

dl.dd: Specifies the protocols to initiate a CONNECT tunnel with.

dd.a: RFC 7639: The ALPN HTTP Header Field

main.pre: ALPN = 1#protocol-id protocol-id = token ; percent-encoded ALPN protocol identifier
CONNECT www.example.com HTTP/1.1 Host: www.example.com ALPN: h2, http%2F1.1
